name: Holes in the Defenses
description:
Holes in the Defenses. 

Made in 1 week for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

You must craft your defenses to fight off the horde of enemies coming your way. They will stop at nothing to get through your defenses and wreak havoc. 

Buildings produce resources over time. If a building is destroyed, then no more of that resource will be generated. 

Can you stop the enemy from tearing holes in your defenses. 

How To Play: 

WASD - Pan Camera
Mouse Wheel - Zoom In/Out
LMB - Place Defense

The game is not complete. I am missing sound/sfx and a whole lot of polish. Unfortunately I can't devote more time to the project(during the jam). So I am submitting what I have. 

*I did have to use 3rd party assets. You can find them here
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/meshtint-free-poly...
